_header: The king Herod with mickle unright
_description: Herod and John the Baptist: Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

CULDd11.First Lines:
Kyng herode wiþ moche myhtreste his brother wif þat
                    hiht…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…vn to þe blisse þat haþ non endyngeOure lord
                    crist thedir vs brynge

CULGg531.First Lines:
Þe kyng herode with mykyll vn ryghtReft hys broþer wyfe
                    þat hyght…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Vnto þat blys þat has nane endyndeOure lorde ihesu
                    vs þithyr brynge

EDCPCM.First Lines:
þe king Herode wit mikel unrihtRaeft his broþer his wif
                    þat hiht…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…To blis þat may has non endingOur lauerd Iesus
                    þider us bring
EDCPCM.Editions:
Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 38-46.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

Lam260.First Lines:
Þis kyng herode with vn rightReft hys broþer wyf þat
                    hyght…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…To blys þat neuere may hafe endyngOure lord Ihesu
                    þidyre vs bryng Amen

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þe kinge herod with mokyll vnryghteReft hys brothyr wyff
                    þat heghte…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…To blys þat may haff no endyngeloueryd ihesu vs thedyr
                    brynge
HunHM129.Note: Begins two lines earlier, with usual last two lines of 4720.
